name: Sticky Situation (julvici, AF_079)
description:
Swipe to dodge knives trying to kill you, to stay alive as long as possible. If you get hit, the knives' speed increases, until it becomes too much. You can stick to walls until your slime meter runs out.

Music:

Game music: Play the game by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com/

Menu music via https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
